text: tavrātaya pahaḷa vīmaṭa pera isrāyīlvarunṭa sǣma āhārayakma anumata kara tibuṇi. ehet (yākūb vana) isrāyīlvarun tamanṭa tahanam kara gat dæya hæra. (ebævin meyaṭa venas andamin pavasana yudevvanṭa nabiyē!) oba mesē kiyanu: “oba ættenma satyaya prakāśa karannan vaśayen siṭinnehu nam, tavrātaya genævit eya kiyavā penvanu”
